characteristics: Balanced floral and herbal aromas with some spiciness
storability: Retains 61% alpha acid after 6 months storage at 20ºC (68ºF)
style_guide: Bitter, California Blonde Ale, Red Ale, Pilsner, Lager, American Amber Ale, Winter Ale, Pale Ale, Wheat Beer, Bavarian Hefeweizen, Cream Ale, American Lager
substitutes: Czech Saaz, Spalter, Santiam, Spalter Select, Saaz, Tettnanger (US)
resistant_to: Resitant to verticillium wilt, moderately resistant to downy mildew
also_known_as: Tettnang, Tettnang Tettnanger, German Tettnang, Tettnanger (GR), Schwetzinger, Deutscher Frühopfen
name: Tettnanger
